abstract: Congressional Republicans, pushing to produce their first budget plan in nearly a decade, are split between fiscal hawks determined to rein in spending and defense hawks bent on increasing military funding; impending budget vote, which requires only simple majority, will provide key test of whether Republican leaders can manage dissent and govern effectively in the majority.
lead_paragraph: Fiscal hawks who are determined to maintain strict spending caps oppose defense hawks who are threatening to derail any budget that does not ensure an increase for the military.

headline.main: Chasm Grows Within G.O.P. Over Spending
headline.print_headline: Chasm Grows Within G.O.P. Over Spending

snippet: Fiscal hawks who are determined to maintain strict spending caps oppose defense hawks who are threatening to derail any budget that does not ensure an increase for the military.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
